name: D.V.D.
description:
First created during gm48 GameJam! But then continued with more updates.

A game that looks like a Screensaver, but look, the DVD logos never stop spawning! Your challenge is to survive and kill the most ammount of DVDs possible before your inevitable death.

Not only that but you can choose your own strenghts and weakness before going into battle! You have 3 points and can increase up to 2 points every stats! These being:

  • Damage, destroy then faster.
  • Health, tank those hits.
  • Speed, dodge then all.

If you want to know whenever i create or update my games you can follow me here or on my twitter @VelcroDev
